titleStmt.title: Panacea Christiana, or, A Christians soueraigne salue for euery soare deliuered in two seuerall sermons, and now digested into one treatise : published for the vse of all distressed Christians.
titleStmt.author: Herring, Theodore, 1596-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Isaac Iaggard for Robert Bird, and are to be sold at his shop in Cheapeside at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Cheapeside at the signe of the Bible
